GSD.description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2021-21417. Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2021-21417. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2021-21417 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

advisories.description: FluidSynth contains a use after free vulnerability in `sfloader/fluid_sffile.c` that can result in arbitrary code execution or a denial of service (DoS) if a malicious soundfont2 file is loaded into a fluidsynth library.
advisories.solution: Unfortunately, there is no solution available yet.
advisories.title: Use After Free
